https://tmrev.io/movie/146853-Aarohanam 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/uaKvV08BKbJVEcBV5fuVJ8M6eEd.jpg Every cloud has a silver lining and Aarohanam showcases the brighter side of a mental disorder, along with all the trials and turbulence of such a life. In an age where the morbidity of poverty has been vehemently publicized, this film strives to unassumingly uncover the true essence of Indian culture while offering a raw and intimate experience of family and community life in the Indian slums. Aarohanam
